profile: Hello, I'm Ramona! My goal is to inspire you to love your home! I specialize in home organization, home/business styling, real estate home staging, and new build/renovation styling. I also work with individuals and families by compassionately guiding them through estate support. I promise to listen and work creatively, with functionality in mind so that spaces are maintained. Now more than ever, our homes should not only work for us but inspire us!  I would love to work with you to create the space you desire and allow you to achieve the benefits of organizing your home! Guaranteed confidentiality in a non-judgmental environment. Virtual options are available. Member of Professional Organizers of Canada. Let's talk soon!
name: Ramona Aline Home

profile:
I am passionate about working with busy professionals, families, and senior citizens to reduce the clutter and stress in their homes, offices and vehicles. I love providing my clients with more time, energy and space for what is really important. 
With 5 years of past experience as a Realtor in Alberta, I bring my business mindset and outstanding customer service experience with me to every project. But what really sets my services apart from the rest of the industry is my attention to detail and receptiveness to the unique needs and emotions of each client. I provide simple and efficient ideas, along with practical and physical assistance in decluttering, designing and organizing any space in your home. I will ensure that you know what you have and where it is, using functional organization strategies and storage solutions.
I specialize in all areas of the home, including living spaces, bedrooms & closets, bathrooms, laundry/utility rooms, home office, garages, and basements. 
I also offer vehicle organization consultations, solutions and hands-on organization assistance.
If you are in need of home staging services before listing your property for sale, would like assistance in minimizing, packing before your move, and then unpacking and organizing in your new home, I offer Session Packages that help make the relocation process less stressful.
Request your free virtual consultation today! I look forward to helping you make room for what matters!
name: Christa Jones - Professional Organizer
